title: 编写出mod运行时候报错
author: AFP
txt_content:
日志如下：---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why is it breaking :(

Time: 15-8-23 下午4:58
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: fyfly
replies.txt_content:
fyfly 发表于 2015-8-23 17:06
你的Proxy class位置写错了@SidedProxy(clientSide = '", serverSide = "")复制代码
这个需要填写你proxy的class路径

replies.author: AFP
replies.txt_content:
fyfly 发表于 2015-8-23 17:13
这个需要填写你proxy的class路径
哦哦……的确……疏忽了……明天试试看~\(≧▽≦)/~
